data.title: Greenlight on Steam: Game Reviews by Tyler Strand — Kickstarter
data.name: Tyler Strand
data.description: My friend Brett and I want to Review Newly Greenlit Games on Steam to help gamers decide on which games are worthy of purchases.

data.title: Occupation: The Awakening by James M Brice — Kickstarter
data.name: James M Brice
data.description: An army frozen in space awakens after 500 years of cryogenic sleep and returns to re-inhabit a radioactive earth.

data.title: D.O.S: "Defenders Of Space" an indie game by Metals Games — Kickstarter
data.name: Metals Games
data.description: D.O.S, Defenders Of Space, is a hybrid tower defense/shooter where you must defend our universe from the 8-BIT dimensional invaders.

data.title: Kick, Punch... Fireball by Lambda Bound Games — Kickstarter
data.name: Lambda Bound Games
data.description: Kick, Punch... Fireball is an FPS type arena game set inside the fantasy world.

data.title: DEAD SYNCHRONICITY: TCT - A dark point and click adventure by Fictiorama Studios — Kickstarter
data.name: Fictiorama Studios
data.description: Old-school 2D graphic adventure game featuring space-time distortions, a dystopian atmosphere... and a dark, bloodstained plot.

data.title: SuperTrip! - Not Your Typical Adventure by 11:11 Studios — Kickstarter
data.name: 11:11 Studios
data.description: It's time for an adventure! Explore new and familiar real world locations in this augmented reality game.

data.title: Earthlock: Festival of Magic (Wii U, PS4, XBO, PC & Mac) by Snowcastle Games — Kickstarter
data.name: Snowcastle Games
data.description: An original turn-based role-playing game set in a world of machines and magic, a world that stopped spinning thousands of years ago.

data.title: MAFIN - software platform for elementary school education. by Tabletized.us — Kickstarter
data.name: Tabletized.us
data.description: MAFIN (/ˈmʌfɪn/) is a software platform that transforms an ordinary Android tablet into an educational device for elementary school.

data.title: Dragon Fin Soup by Grimm Bros — Kickstarter
data.name: Grimm Bros
data.description: A  charming SNES style RPG with Roguelike elements, set in a twisted fairytale world with a cheerful, yet raging alcoholic Heroine

data.title: DUELYST by Counterplay Games — Kickstarter
data.name: Counterplay Games
data.description: Squad-Based Tactical Combat with Ranked Competitive Play. Brought to you by veterans from Diablo III and Rogue Legacy.

data.title: ThisGameSukz by Frank — Kickstarter
data.name: Frank
data.description: Top-Down arcade style game with Zombies and Powerups. Can you Survive the invasion?  Made for iOS & Android.

data.title: Syndicate Role Playing Game by Jonathon Cook — Kickstarter
data.name: Jonathon Cook
data.description: Next gen online RPG! In-depth class customization and advanced combat possibilities. This RPG will leave you begging for more!

data.title: Extreme real Reality HD Remix by Dylan Prindle — Kickstarter
data.name: Dylan Prindle
data.description: Clouded by apathy, Carlo has lost touch with himself. He must travel through a myriad of adventures to find his own real reality.

data.title: Spirit by Holden Boyles — Kickstarter
data.name: Holden Boyles
data.description: Take a stroll through the mystical landscapes of this pixel art game to uncover the long forgotten past of an ancient temple.

data.title: The UnEarth Initiative - A Quirky Space Colonization Sim by Inkling Games — Kickstarter
data.name: Inkling Games
data.description: Help outcasts colonize an alien planet in this comic sci-fi sim game by veteran developers.

data.title: Spectre: Virtual Reality Horror by Proscenium — Kickstarter
data.name: Proscenium
data.description: "Haunt your friends or be haunted in Spectre, an ambitious new first-person horror/thriller game"

data.title: RGBy by Mozaco Games — Kickstarter
data.name: Mozaco Games
data.description: Ever wonder what happens to all those items you lose, waste and otherwise obliterate in games? We have the answer!

data.title: The Blind Shrine Maiden - survival horror with a twist by mikejkelley — Kickstarter
data.name: mikejkelley
data.description: Guide Hoshimi using the first person perspective... of the demons chasing her! The world's first 2nd person shooter!

data.title: Lumin: Land of Light by Project: Game Play Theatre — Kickstarter
data.name: Project: Game Play Theatre
data.description: A new concept of RPG, watch the storyline online for free, and the game allows you to live everyday life as a resident of Lumin.

data.title: Chronicles of Inky (Underworld Expansion Pack) by PigDug Studios — Kickstarter
data.name: PigDug Studios
data.description: A real-time physics based puzzle strategy game where the aim is to draw lines in order to get to the next level.

data.title: Axe Princess by Axe Princess Team — Kickstarter
data.name: Axe Princess Team
data.description: Axe Princess is an fantasy, action, beat'em-up game. It uses 2d animated sprite graphics and aims to be violent, cool and sexy!

data.title: Shrug Island by Amazu Media — Kickstarter
data.name: Amazu Media
data.description: A environmental adventure game about hope in the mysterious hand-drawn Shrug world. Ambient story, magic and animated music puzzles.

data.title: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2 by KING Art Games — Kickstarter
data.name: KING Art Games
data.description: Help us tread new paths with the second installment of the acclaimed BoUT adventure game series. A sequel is coming...

data.title: Epic Brawl by Art Dylan Stolz — Kickstarter
data.name: Art Dylan Stolz
data.description: A fighting game currently in development for PC, designed with fun in mind with Smash Bros. like game mechanics.

data.title: Campus Beer Run 3D - Drunk College Endless Runner Game App by Wutango Media — Kickstarter
data.name: Wutango Media
data.description: Run from the cops in this “temple run for belligerent college party-goers” mobile game, complete with all-night chaos and debauchery.

data.title: iOS Cartoon-Themed Casino Games by David J. Ginter — Kickstarter
data.name: David J. Ginter

data.title: BasketWars: World at War for iOS by Jeremy Born — Kickstarter
data.name: Jeremy Born
data.description: BasketWars is an insane, challenging basketball game set in WWII coming first to iOS in March 2014.

data.title: Wing Commander Music Orchestral Recording Project by George Oldziey — Kickstarter
data.name: George Oldziey
data.description: George Oldziey is looking for game music fans from around the world to help fund an orchestral recording of music from Wing Commander.

data.title: Omega Constructor by Matthew Cranston — Kickstarter

data.name: Craig Mullen
data.description: The "PINBALL JUKEBOX ARCADE MUSEUM" is asking the Kickstarter community for help to open our museum and preserve coin operated games!

data.title: Shining Empire: A Massive Role-Playing Adventure by Arcade County LLC — Kickstarter
data.name: Arcade County LLC

data.title: Jumpie by Thomas Neptune — Kickstarter

data.name: Game Mechanics LLC

data.title: Crimson Nocturne by Michael and Matthew Gallimore — Kickstarter
data.name: Michael and Matthew Gallimore
data.description: A 2D Platformer game inspired by classic games like Castlevania and Ghosts,n Goblins.

data.title: Constitution Town: Innovative eLearning Videogame! Phase 1 by Liberty Day — Kickstarter
data.name: Liberty Day
data.description: Constitution Town is a revolutionary, educational and interactive videogame being designed to teach students about American government.

data.title: [8-bit Adventure Game] Adventura by Parker Gay (PurpleBrickGames) — Kickstarter
data.name: Parker Gay (PurpleBrickGames)
data.description: Adventura is a permadeath adventure game set in the lands of Adventura!  You have to defeat the evil king and save Adventura!

data.title: The Object Epsilon by Sergei Golovanov — Kickstarter
data.name: Sergei Golovanov
data.description: The battle between humanity and aliens on robots! Eight views of the game, including the online version.

data.title: Crooked City by Kris Michael — Kickstarter
data.name: Kris Michael
data.description: Your choices shape the city’s future in this open-world episodic crime drama action RPG game for PC, Console, and Mobile/Tablet.

data.title: Bubble Man: Journey Through The Stars by Dwight Potvin — Kickstarter
data.name: Dwight Potvin
data.description: An epic journey of a man made of bubbles as he embarks through time and space to save his planet from destruction.

data.title: App Remake, Monster in the Marsh for iPhone by engine001kid — Kickstarter
data.name: engine001kid
data.description: I've built and published my Monster in the Marsh app on the App Store. While technically sound, it needs heavy rework and marketing.

data.title: Kamodo Steve: Run, jump, and shoot to save the environment! by Matthew Board — Kickstarter
data.name: Matthew Board
data.description: Because sometimes, crime doesn’t flush the first time! Help Kamodo Steve end the pollution of the local water supply.

data.title: "Teddy Burn" by Wafful Pet Games — Kickstarter
data.name: Wafful Pet Games
data.description: We hope to finish not only a game but an great game that people will enjoy and remember.Um "humanoid giant horrific zombie killer toys"

data.title: Ink by Misfit Games — Kickstarter
data.name: Misfit Games
data.description: Ink is a unique puzzle platforming game being developed by Misfit Games Co. based in the Midwest!

data.title: EvoCreo™ - A monster collection RPG by Ebrahim Behbahani — Kickstarter
data.name: Ebrahim Behbahani
data.description: EvoCreo is a monster collection/battling game in the same spirit as Pokemon, but emphasizes deeper gameplay and monster customization.

data.title: Talk 'Em Down by Tre Sussy Vaughn — Kickstarter
data.name: Tre Sussy Vaughn
data.description: Talk 'Em Down is a game where you attempt to talk a suicide jumper down off of a building.

data.title: Apollyonic by Sean Marbaugh — Kickstarter
data.name: Sean Marbaugh
data.description: Apollyonic is a new breed zombie shooter mixed with exploration, crafting/building, and super powers!

data.title: PipeWords: The Cave Sector (spooky!) by Dream Boy — Kickstarter
data.name: Dream Boy
data.description: A new world for PipeWords, the groundbreaking word/puzzle game!  And it takes place in a cave, too!

data.title: Operation Squiddershins: More Games, Less Pizza by Squiddershins — Kickstarter
data.name: Squiddershins
data.description: Did you know that if Jason wasn’t making pizzas at Costco, he’d be making cool games for you to play?

data.title: Heroes of Issachar - Quest, Build Your Castle, Defend It by Saved Games, Inc. — Kickstarter
data.name: Saved Games, Inc.
data.description: Heroes of Issachar is a faith-based Action RPG where you quest, build your castle, and defend it against the enemy.

data.title: Nightmare Core by Dylan Dodds — Kickstarter
data.name: Dylan Dodds
data.description: Nightmare Core is an amazing new way for users to learn to code and develop games by ACTUALLY playing a game!

data.title: Starship Tranquility ::Sci Fi RPG by Andy "Cosmo-Joe" Watkins — Kickstarter
data.name: Andy "Cosmo-Joe" Watkins
data.description: A fun sci-fi RPG with a simple turn-based combat style where you are the captain of an outlaw spaceship and crew of eccentric misfits.

data.title: Morads: A Lemmings Tribute For PC, iOS and Android by North South 804 APPS LLC — Kickstarter
data.name: North South 804 APPS LLC
data.description: Would you like to make your own Lemmings style game? If we are funded you will be able to. Play your own levels, keep this genre ALIVE.

data.title: Conspiracy Prophecy 2017 - PC Game by Super Tea Studios — Kickstarter
data.name: Super Tea Studios
data.description: It's all true. Every conspiracy you've ever heard. Aliens. Blackbaggings. The Illuminati. And you're in charge. (PC game: Windows).

data.title: Meowsome Cat Eats the Universe by Julian Zborowski — Kickstarter
data.name: Julian Zborowski

data.name: Bryan Wiegele & Simon Rosati

data.title: Colony Capture: Teaching Games Through Doing! by Chris Lee — Kickstarter
data.name: Chris Lee

data.title: Tiny Trek by Chris Carson — Kickstarter

data.title: MIR: The World Domination Game by Adam Guthrie — Kickstarter
data.name: Adam Guthrie

data.title: Live Warfare: Real-Life First-Person-Shooter Mobile App by Nathan Nash Eyal and Omer C. Eyal — Kickstarter
data.name: Nathan Nash Eyal and Omer C. Eyal

data.title: Spark Community: a building, farming, and survival MMORPG by Games of Light — Kickstarter
data.name: Games of Light

data.title: Jumpman Forever by Davis Ray Sickmon, Jr — Kickstarter
data.name: Davis Ray Sickmon, Jr

data.title: Fate Fighters - The Ultimate Decision Maker by Odity — Kickstarter
data.name: Odity
data.description: Can’t make up your mind about something? Simply type in your two options and let the fighters of fate decide for you!

data.title: THE DIVINER by Two Crowns Entertainment — Kickstarter
data.name: Two Crowns Entertainment

data.title: Imagine Nations by Cat Banana Studios — Kickstarter
data.name: Cat Banana Studios

data.title: Void: Flight of the Vampire by Wicked Pixels — Kickstarter
data.name: Wicked Pixels
data.description: Void is a turn based strategy game. Witty dialogue, wilder assumptions. No genre is safe from our parodying.

data.title: Requiem by Jolly Roger Studios — Kickstarter
data.name: Jolly Roger Studios

data.title: TiNKiDO - Educational video games by TiNKiDO - Think I Do — Kickstarter
data.name: TiNKiDO - Think I Do

data.title: Art Life: The Game by Daniel DeltaTangoMike Flores — Kickstarter
data.name: Daniel DeltaTangoMike Flores

data.title: The LOST ROBOs by Joshua Koester — Kickstarter
data.name: Joshua Koester

data.title: Sneak Mouse (an iOS game) by McCartney Leopardi — Kickstarter
data.name: McCartney Leopardi
data.description: It's mouse vs. cat with a new take on red-light green-light. Featuring simple controls, addicting mazes and custom pixel art!

data.title: Tesla Boy - A Robots Journey to Becoming Human by Dream Bot Studios — Kickstarter
data.name: Dream Bot Studios
data.description: Take an adventure of enlightened transformation. Battle the mysterious Robotic Cabal and save a world from mass robotic termination.

data.title: Mansion Lord - A Murder Mystery RPG/Business Sim by Golgom Games — Kickstarter
data.name: Golgom Games

data.title: Never Surrender: An Homage to Great Light Gun Arcade Games by Nathan Gilmore — Kickstarter
data.name: Nathan Gilmore

data.title: Immersive by Dark Anime Studios — Kickstarter
data.name: Dark Anime Studios
data.description: Immersive is a multiplayer exclusive fighter with the power to create your own unique character & fully control your destiny.

data.title: THE ULTIMATE VILLAIN by Isaiah Tillman — Kickstarter
data.name: Isaiah Tillman

data.title: Sanga by Chi Ni — Kickstarter
data.name: Chi Ni

data.title: Hemp Empire - Video Game by Nic Haag — Kickstarter
data.name: Nic Haag

data.name: Shortwave Laboratories

data.title: 1979 REVOLUTION: Black Friday by iNK Stories — Kickstarter
data.name: iNK Stories

data.title: TesserAct by Clayton Otto Walters — Kickstarter

data.title: So Many Me - PC/Mac/Linux/Wii U by Extend Studio — Kickstarter
data.name: Extend Studio

data.title: bob's game (from inside "bob's game") - for OUYA and PC by bobsgame — Kickstarter
data.name: bobsgame

data.title: Triomancer by D-n-S Design Company, LLC — Kickstarter
data.name: D-n-S Design Company, LLC
data.description: A light-hearted, side-scrolling puzzler following the (mis)adventures of three apprentice wizards on a quest to save their Master.
